text: Theresa Magdalena "Tisa" Farrow (July 22, 1951 â€“ January 10, 2024) was an American actress and model. She was born in Los Angeles, California. Her career lasted from 1970 to 1980. She was the sister of Mia Farrow. She was known for her roles in Zombi 2 (1979), The Last Hunter (1980), and Antropophagus (1980). Farrow died on January 10, 2024, at the age of 72.El conmovedor mensaje de Mia Farrow tras la muerte de su hermana Tisa ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Models from Los Angeles
